short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically skip artists on Google Music right inside of your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can now skip a certain Artist in your Google Music Player in Chrome using this extension. When listening to a playlist, Google Music Artist Skipper automatically checks to see if you have auto skipped the current playing artist and moves to the next song. To skip an artist, right click on the artist name either in the playlist popup or through the artist name in the table list and click "Always Skip [artist]". To remove the skip for an artist, simply do the same as before and select "Dont Skip [artist]".
